name: adjunct_combine_str.py
author: AFNI Developers
description: A simple helper function for fat_proc* scripts that processes string selectors and outputs a new string selector.

inputs.description: An int that is the upper index for the selector (-1 means to use the max number in the input strings)
inputs.name: Upper Index

inputs.description: One or more string selector strings of *goods* to keep
inputs.name: String Selectors

output-files.description: The output file containing the new string selector
output-files.name: Output Selector File
